Package org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie

Class PersistentCookieAuthModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.AuthLoginModule
      • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.JaspiAuthLoginModule
        • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie.PersistentCookieAuthModule
  • public class PersistentCookieAuthModule
extends JaspiAuthLoginModule
    Authentication logic for persistent cookie authentication in OpenAM. Making use of the JASPI JwtSessionModule to create and verify the persistent cookie.

      Constructs an instance of the PersistentCookieAuthModule.

      If Jwt is invalid then throws LoginException, otherwise Jwt is valid and the realm is check to ensure the user is authenticating in the same realm.

      • generateConfig

        protected Map<String,​Object> generateConfig​(Subject subject,
                                                  Map sharedState,
                                                  Map options)
        Initialises the JwtSessionModule for use by the AM Login Module.
        Specified by:
        generateConfig in class JaspiAuthLoginModule
        Parameters:
        subject - The Subject to be authenticated.
        sharedState - The state shared with other configured LoginModules.
        options - The options specified in the Login Configuration for this particular LoginModule.
        Returns:
        The Map of configuration information for the underlying JASPI ServerAuthModule.

      • process

        public int process​(Callback[] callbacks,
                   int state)
            throws LoginException
        Overridden as to call different method on underlying JASPI JwtSessionModule.
        Overrides:
        process in class JaspiAuthLoginModule
        Parameters:
        callbacks - The array of Callbacks for this Login state.
        state - The order of state. State order starts with 1.
        Returns:
        order of next state. Return -1 if authentication is successful, return 0 if the AuthLoginModule should be ignored.
        Throws:
        LoginException - If the login process fails.

      • process

        protected boolean process​(javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo messageInfo,
                          Subject clientSubject,
                          Callback[] callbacks)
                   throws LoginException
        If Jwt is invalid then throws LoginException, otherwise Jwt is valid and the realm is check to ensure the user is authenticating in the same realm.
        Specified by:
        process in class JaspiAuthLoginModule
        Parameters:
        messageInfo - The ServerAuthModules MessageInfo instance.
        clientSubject - A Subject that represents the source of the service request.
        callbacks - An array of Callbacks for this Login state.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the internal processing has succeeded or not.
        Throws:
        LoginException - If the login process fails.

      • getPrincipal

        public Principal getPrincipal()
        Abstract method must be implemented by each login module to get the user Principal.
        Specified by:
        getPrincipal in class AuthLoginModule
        Returns:
        The Principal.
